rooms.name: Courtyard
rooms.description: Central open courtyard with vegetation and water features to enhance Vastu principles of natural elements.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with minimalistic design and ample lighting, connecting to the courtyard.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living space integrated with dining area near the central courtyard for natural light and fresh air.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated with dining area; features open counters and energy-efficient appliances.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with attached bathroom and walk-in closet; positioned in the northeast for auspicious Vastu placement.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Minimalist bedroom with natural lighting and built-in storage; situated in the northwest for balance.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with adjacent bathroom and storage; placed in the southwest as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: Quiet study area with ample storage and natural light, located adjacent to the living space.

rooms.name: Utility Area
rooms.description: Compact area for laundry and storage; positioned near service areas with efficient access.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large glass door for ample natural light entering the entrance hall and connecting to the courtyard.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: Balcony overlooking the courtyard with minimalistic railings to enhance view.

openings.name: Windows
openings.description: Energy-efficient windows distributed across living areas and bedrooms for optimal light and ventilation.

openings.name: Swimming Pool Entrance
openings.description: Access point to the swimming pool from the open area.

other_elements.name: Swimming Pool
other_elements.description: Integrated swimming pool in the south-east corner; designed with minimalist style and natural filtration.
